pages.text: In addition to $(l:basics/spells)imbuing and removing spells$(), the Imbuer can also be used to repair items.$(br2)Place a damaged item in the Imbuer and then places the appropriate repair material in next. These are consumed once the process is complete, and the damaged item is repaired & returned.

$(l:apparatus/wildwood_armor)Wildwood armor pieces$() along with the $(l:apparatus/wildwood_bow)wildwood bow$() & $(l:apparatus/wildwood_quiver)quiver$() can be repaired with $(l:resources/wildwood)wildwood bark$().$(br2)In addition to the Imbuer, wildwood bark can repair these items in an anvil for the usual costs.

$(l:apparatus/sylvan_armor)Sylvan armor pieces$() can be repaired with $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$().$(br2)In addition to the Imbuer, fey leather can repair these items in an anvil for the usual costs.

Standard vanilla items can be repaired with their relevant anvil repair item, but without the repair cost.$(br2)In addition, many other modded items can also be repaired -- if they can be repaired in an anvil.
